mapper.select: SELECT MTM.COMPANY_CD , MTM.DIVISION_CD , MTM.VENDOR_CD AS PARTNER_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MTM.COMPANY_CD, MTM.DIVISION_CD, MTM.VENDOR_CD) FROM DUAL) AS PARTNER_NM , MTM.TAX_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MTM.COMPANY_CD, MTM.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0029', MTM.TAX_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS TAX_TYPE_NM , TO_CHAR(MTM.INVOICE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INVOICE_DATE , MTD.ITEM_ID , MIN(MI.ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM , MIN(MI.ITEM_SPEC) AS ITEM_SPEC , MIN(MI.ITEM_TYPE) AS ITEM_TYPE , MIN((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MTM.COMPANY_CD, MTM.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL)) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , SUM(MTD.QTY) AS QTY , SUM(MTD.LOCAL_AMOUNT) AS LOCAL_AMOUNT , SUM(MTD.TAX_AMOUNT) AS TAX_AMOUNT , MTM.VENDOR_CD || '_' || MTD.ITEM_ID || '_' || MTM.TAX_TYPE || '_' || MTM.INVOICE_DATE AS KEY_ID , MTM.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH FROM MOM_TAX_INVOICE_MST MTM , MOM_TAX_INVOICE_DTL MTD , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MTM.COMPANY_CD = MTD.COMPANY_CD AND MTM.DIVISION_CD = MTD.DIVISION_CD AND MTM.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH = MTD.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH AND MTM.VENDOR_CD = MTD.VENDOR_CD AND MTM.INVOICE_DATE = MTD.INVOICE_DATE AND MTM.TAX_TYPE = MTD.TAX_TYPE AND MTD.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MTD.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MTD.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MTM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MTM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MTM.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH = #{closeYearMonth, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MTM.PUR_SAL_TYPE = 'P' GROUP BY MTM.COMPANY_CD , MTM.DIVISION_CD , MTM.VENDOR_CD , MTD.ITEM_ID , MTM.TAX_TYPE , MTM.INVOICE_DATE , MTM.CLOSE_YEAR_MONTH
